pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Adaptive Designs for Phase II Trials with Binary Endpoint // Tools and workflow to choose design parameters in Bayesian adaptive single-arm phase II trial designs with binary endpoint (response, success) with possible stopping for efficacy and futility at interim analyses. Also contains routines to determine and visualize operating characteristics. See Kopp-Schneider et al. (2018) doi:10.1002/bimj.201700209.
